message: Hello everyone, I'm P5. I'm looking forward to playing this game with you all. My strategy is to be open and honest in the public rounds, and to try to build alliances in the private rounds. I think communication is key to surviving, so I hope to talk to as many of you as possible. Good luck to everyone, and let's see who can outlast the others. I am open to different strategies and adjusting as needed.

Best of luck to everyone—let’s see how this plays out!
